name: hv_x86_reg_t
desc: The type that defines x86 architectural registers.

items.name: var HV_X86_RIP: hv_x86_reg_t
items.desc: The value that identifies the x86 instruction pointer register.

items.name: var HV_X86_RFLAGS: hv_x86_reg_t
items.desc: The value that identifies the x86 status register.

items.name: var HV_X86_RAX: hv_x86_reg_t
items.desc: The value that identifies the x86 accumulator register.

items.name: var HV_X86_RCX: hv_x86_reg_t
items.desc: The value that identifies the x86 counter register.

items.name: var HV_X86_RDX: hv_x86_reg_t
items.desc: The value that identifies the x86 data register.

items.name: var HV_X86_RBX: hv_x86_reg_t
items.desc: The value that identifies the x86 base register.

items.name: var HV_X86_RSI: hv_x86_reg_t
items.desc: The value that identifies the x86 source index register.

items.name: var HV_X86_RDI: hv_x86_reg_t
items.desc: The value that identifies the x86 destination index register.

items.name: var HV_X86_RSP: hv_x86_reg_t
items.desc: The value that identifies the x86 stack pointer register.

items.name: var HV_X86_RBP: hv_x86_reg_t
items.desc: The value that identifies the x86 base pointer register.

items.name: var HV_X86_R8: hv_x86_reg_t
items.desc: The value that identifies the x86 general-purpose register R8.

items.name: var HV_X86_R9: hv_x86_reg_t
items.desc: The value that identifies the x86 general-purpose register R9.

items.name: var HV_X86_R10: hv_x86_reg_t
items.desc: The value that identifies the x86 general-purpose register R10.

items.name: var HV_X86_R11: hv_x86_reg_t
items.desc: The value that identifies the x86 general-purpose register R11.

items.name: var HV_X86_R12: hv_x86_reg_t
items.desc: The value that identifies the x86 general-purpose register R12.

items.name: var HV_X86_R13: hv_x86_reg_t
items.desc: The value that identifies the x86 general-purpose register R13.

items.name: var HV_X86_R14: hv_x86_reg_t
items.desc: The value that identifies the x86 general-purpose register R14.

items.name: var HV_X86_R15: hv_x86_reg_t
items.desc: The value that identifies the x86 general-purpose register R15.

items.name: var HV_X86_CS: hv_x86_reg_t
items.desc: The value that identifies the x86 code-segment register.

items.name: var HV_X86_SS: hv_x86_reg_t
items.desc: The value that identifies the x86 stack-segment register.

items.name: var HV_X86_DS: hv_x86_reg_t
items.desc: The value that identifies the x86 data-segment register.

items.name: var HV_X86_ES: hv_x86_reg_t
items.desc: The value that identifies the x86 segment register ES.

items.name: var HV_X86_FS: hv_x86_reg_t
items.desc: The value that identifies the x86 segment register FS.

items.name: var HV_X86_GS: hv_x86_reg_t
items.desc: The value that identifies the x86 segment register GS.

items.name: var HV_X86_IDT_BASE: hv_x86_reg_t
items.desc: The value that identifies the x86 interrupt descriptor, table-base register.

items.name: var HV_X86_IDT_LIMIT: hv_x86_reg_t
items.desc: The value that identifies the x86 interrupt descriptor, table-base register.

items.name: var HV_X86_GDT_BASE: hv_x86_reg_t
items.desc: The value that identifies the x86 global descriptor, table-base register.

items.name: var HV_X86_GDT_LIMIT: hv_x86_reg_t
items.desc: The value that identifies the x86 global descriptor, table-limit register.

items.name: var HV_X86_LDTR: hv_x86_reg_t
items.desc: The value that identifies the x86 local descriptor, table register.

items.name: var HV_X86_LDT_BASE: hv_x86_reg_t
items.desc: The value that identifies the x86 local descriptor, table-base register.

items.name: var HV_X86_LDT_LIMIT: hv_x86_reg_t
items.desc: The value that identifies the x86 local descriptor, table-limit register.

items.name: var HV_X86_LDT_AR: hv_x86_reg_t
items.desc: The value that identifies the x86 local descriptor table, access-rights register.

items.name: var HV_X86_TR: hv_x86_reg_t
items.desc: The value that identifies the x86 task register.

items.name: var HV_X86_TSS_BASE: hv_x86_reg_t
items.desc: The value that identifies the x86 task-state, segment-base register.

items.name: var HV_X86_TSS_LIMIT: hv_x86_reg_t
items.desc: The value that identifies the x86 task state segment limit register.

items.name: var HV_X86_TSS_AR: hv_x86_reg_t
items.desc: The value that identifies the x86 task-state, segment-access, rights register.

items.desc: The value that identifies the x86 control-register CR4.

items.name: var HV_X86_DR0: hv_x86_reg_t
items.desc: The value that identifies the x86 debug-register DR0.

items.name: var HV_X86_DR1: hv_x86_reg_t
items.desc: The value that identifies the x86 debug-register DR1.

items.name: var HV_X86_DR2: hv_x86_reg_t
items.desc: The value that identifies the x86 debug-register DR2.

items.desc: The value that identifies the x86 debug-register DR7.

items.name: var HV_X86_TPR: hv_x86_reg_t
items.desc: The value that identifies the x86 task-priority register.

items.name: var HV_X86_XCR0: hv_x86_reg_t
items.desc: The value that identifies the x86 extended-control register.

items.name: var HV_X86_REGISTERS_MAX: hv_x86_reg_t
items.desc: The value that identifies the maximum value of x86 register constants.

items.name: init(UInt32)
items.desc: Creates a new x86 architectural register instance.

items.name: init(rawValue: UInt32)
items.desc: Creates a new x86 architectural register instance.

items.name: var rawValue: UInt32
items.desc: An unsigned 32-bit integer representing the x86 architectural registers.
